page.title: 10Clubs in Johnstone
page.content: In Johnstone there are many clubs, catering for various sections of the community,many operating from the local community centres and churches.Here is a selection: Johnstone Mentally Handicapped Social Club;Johnstone Pipe Band;Johnstone Silver Band;Phoenix Group;Johnstone Amateur Boxing Club;Johnstone Amateur Football Club;Cochrane Castle Golf Club;Johnstone Chess Club;Johnstone Bridge Club;Johnstone Record Club; Corseford Senior Citizen's Club;Wings Youth Club; Corseford Youth Club; Spateston Residents Associaton; Sandyflats Tenants Association;Little Corseford T.A.;Johnstone American Football Club; Alcholics Anonymous operating from several churches. There are also various types of keep fit classes which have appeared because of the recent interest in good health.
